item.title: cytobank experiment to gatingset
item.description: library(CytoML) acsfile <- system.file("extdata/cytobank_experiment.acs", package = "CytoML") #constrct ce object ce <- open_cytobank_experiment(acsfile) ce ## cytobank Experiment: tcell ## gatingML File: /tmp/Rtmp4q2XMJ/file60f96bce729b/experiments/3637/cytobank_gate_ml2_v41.xml ## panel samples ## 1 Panel 1 1 #ce accessors ce_get_compensations(ce)[[1]] ## B710-A R660-A R780-A V450-A V545-A G560-A ## B710-A 1.00000e+00 3.14389e-02 0.190966000 0.003057570 0.00204723 3.44241e-04 ## R660-A 5.53798e-03 1.00000e+00 0.176812000 0.000000000 0.00000000 0.00000e+00 ## R780-A 9.95863e-05 9.84766e-03 1.000000000 0.000000000 0.00000000 0.00000e+00 ## V450-A 0.00000e+00 8.90985e-05 0.000000000 1.
